loans.use: to buy construction materials for her home (iron, beams, sand, cement, stone, etc.).

loans.name: Jingy

texts.en:
Jingy is 40 years old and lives in the Philippines. She is married with four children.
 
Jingy has a food/retail shop or sari-sari store where she buys & sells canned goods, snacks, personal care products, home use products & beverages. She has had this business for five years. She requested a loan for 11,000 to buy stocks of canned goods, snacks, soap, detergents, shampoo & beverages.

Jingy has been a member of HSPFI since 2012.  In the future, Jingy hopes to improve her business for the education of her children.

loans.use: to buy stock of canned goods, snacks, detergent, bath soap  and beverages

loans.name: Amelia

texts.pt:
Nasceu no Distrito Bilene, Província de Gaza, sul de Moçambique, casada e mãe de 5 filhos apenas o mais novo frequenta a Escola. Fez 4ª classe e não continuou devido a falta de condições financeiras. Vive na casa própria com a sua família e sustenta seu sobrinho que vive com ela. 
		
Saiu de Gaza para Maputo a procura de melhores condicoes de vida, é comerciante há mais de 10 anos e consegue um rendimento de cerca 5.000,00mt por mês que aplica nas despesas de casa e poupa algum na sua conta bancária e no xitique (sistema tradicional de poupança rotativa).

Já teve empréstimos noutros bancos e pagou sem dificuldades, conheceu a Hluvuku através de uma amiga que também é cliente desta instituição. Este é o seu segundo empréstimo na Hluvuku no valor de 20.000.00mt, com qual pretende comprar produtos (óleo, feijão, arroz, farinha e outros) para aumentar a quantidade da sua mercadoria. O empréstimo anterior foi de 10.000,00mt aplicado para a mesma actividade.
Compromete se a pagar devidamente o empréstimo e no futuro pretende comprar uma viatura para ajudar no transporte da sua mercadoria, para conta com mais empréstimos da Hluvuku.
texts.en:
Amelia was born in the district of Bilene in the province of Gaza in southern Mozambique.  She is married and has 5 children.  Only the youngest is still in school.  She studied through the fourth grade and didn't continue due to the lack of financial resources.  She lives in her own home with her family and also supports her nephew, who lives with her.

She left Gaza for Maputo in search of better living conditions.  She has had a business for more than 10 years, and she makes close to 5,000 meticals a month, which she puts towards her home's expenses.  She also saves some in her bank account and through Xitique (a traditional rotating savings system).

She has had loans through other banks, which she paid back without any problems.  She became familiar with Hluvuku through a friend who is also a client of the institution.  This is her second loan with Hluvuku, and it is for 20,000 meticals.  She will use it to buy products (butter, beans, rice, flour, etc.) to increase her quantity of merchandise.  Her previous loan was for 10,000 meticals, which she also used to buy products.

She promises to pay back her loan on time.  In the future, she hopes to buy a vehicle to help transport her merchandise, for which she is counting on more loans from Hluvuku.

loans.use: to buy products (butter, beans, rice, flour, etc.).

loans.name: Florencia

texts.en:
Florencia is 51 years old and married.

She earns a living by buying and selling livestock in the Philippines. Florencia is borrowing PHP 12,000 through NWTF to buy more livestock to raise and sell.

Florencia has been buying and selling livestock for nine years and earns additional income from food vending.

She is working tirelessly toward the attainment of her dream: to save money to expand her business.

loans.use: To buy more livestock to raise and sell

loans.name: Adjoa

texts.en: Adjoa is into gari production. Gari is made out of cassava. It is for sale at Breman near Elmina. She has been doing this for three years now. She is married to a farmer and has three children. She uses her income to help her husband to pay their accommodation and utility bills. Adjoa will use her loan to purchase cassava to produce her gari to sell. With the new profit, she will expand her business.

loans.use: to purchase cassava to produce gari to sell

loans.name: Emérita

texts.es:
Emérita es una señora luchadora que se desempeña como profesora de primaria desde hace más de veinte años, profesión que le ha permitido ganar siempre su salario y ayudar a su esposo con los gastos del hogar, también preparar a sus dos hijas como mujeres luchadoras que se valen por sí solas.
Tiene año y medio de trabajar con Ceprodel donde le han otorgado tres créditos para resolver problemas personales en su hogar.
Este último crédito lo solicita para pagar un trabajo que se está realizando en sus dientes el cual no hubiera podido llevarlo a cabo con su bajo salario por lo que agradece a Ceprodel por su apoyo en otorgarles estos préstamos que le resuelven sus necesidades personales en algún momento de sus vidas.
texts.en:
Emérita is a woman who is a fighter. She has worked as a primary school teacher for more than twenty years. This is a profession that has allowed her to always earn an income, to help her husband with the home expenses, and to raise her two daughters as fighting women who are self-sufficient.

She has been working with CEPRODEL for a year and a half. They have granted her three loans to resolve personal problems in her home. She is requesting this last loan to pay for a procedure that she is having done on her teeth, which she had not been able to do with her low salary. Therefore, she is grateful to CEPRODEL for their support in granting her these loans that fulfill her personal needs at any time in her life.

loans.use: to pay for dental work.

loans.name: Yussuf

texts.en:
Yusuf is a married man with six children, three of whom attend school. He lives in a rental house that has neither electricity nor piped water. His greatest monthly expense is food for the family.

Yusuf has operated a business selling fresh water using his handcart for the past two months. He sells from door-to-door to his neighbors. He faces a major challenge of competition in his business.

With the KSHS 20,000, he wants to purchase another handcart for use in the water distribution business. He decided to join Yehu to access loans to boost his business.

loans.use: to purchase another handcart for use in his water distribution business.

loans.name: Ernesto

texts.pt:
Nasceu na cidade de Maputo, Província de mesmo nome, sul de Moçambique, casado e pai de 4 filhos todos frequentam a Escola. Fez o nível medio e não continuou devido a falta de tempo. Vive na casa própria com a sua família e não sustenta ninguém. 
		
Trabalha como docente na Escola antigos combatentes há mais de 17 anos e tem um salário de 7.395,00mt por mês que aplica nas despesas de casa e poupa algum na sua conta bancária (BIM).

Já teve empréstimos noutros bancos (BIM) e pagou sem dificuldades. Conheceu a Hluvuku através de um colega que também é cliente desta instituição. Este é o seu segundo empréstimo na Hluvuku no valor de 15.000.00mt, com qual pretende comprar material de construção para a obra da sua casa (loiça sanitária, areia, cimento, pedra e outros). O empréstimo anterior foi de 15.000,00mt aplicado na mesma actividade.
Compromete se a pagar devidamente o empréstimo e no futuro pretende concluir a sua residência e continuar com os estudos, para tal tenciona solicitar mais empréstimos a Hluvuku.
texts.en:
Ernesto was born in the city of Maputo in the province of the same name in southern Mozambique.  He is married and the father of 4 children, all of whom go to school.  He studied through high school and didn't continue due to lack of time.  He lives in his own home with his family and doesn't support anyone besides them.

He has worked at the veterans' school for more than 17 years and makes 7,395 meticals per month, which he puts towards his home's expenses.  He also saves some in his bank account at the BIM bank.

He has had loans with BIM, which he paid back without any problems.  He became familiar with Hluvuku through a colleague who is also a client of the institution.  This is his second loan with Hluvuku in the amount of 15,000 meticals.  He will use it to buy construction materials for his home (bathroom fixtures, sand, cement, stone, etc.).  His previous loan was for 15,000 meticals, which also went towards his home.  

He promises to pay back his loan on time.  In the future, he wants to finish his home and continue his education, for which he plans on requesting more loans from Hluvuku.

loans.use: to buy construction materials for his home (bathroom fixtures, sand, cement, stone, etc.)

loans.name: Gonsalves

texts.pt:
Nasceu no Distrito de Boane, Província de Maputo, sul de Moçambique, casado sem filhos. Fez apenas a 4ª classe e não continuou devido a falta de condições financeiras. Vive na casa própria com a sua esposa e não sustenta ninguém. 
		
Trabalha como ajudante na empresa BANANALANDIA há mais de 2 anos e tem um salário de 2.100,00mt por mês que aplica nas despesas de casa e poupa algum na sua conta bancária.

Nunca teve empréstimos noutros bancos, conheceu a Hluvuku através de um colega que também é cliente desta instituição. Este é o seu primeiro empréstimo na Hluvuku no valor de 8.000.00mt, com qual pretende comprar material de construção para a obra da sua casa (areia, cimento, pedra, barrotes e outros). 
Compromete se a pagar devidamente o empréstimo e no futuro pretende concluir e mobilar a sua residência, para tal tenciona solicitar mais empréstimos a Hluvuku.
texts.en:
Gonsalves was born in the district of Boane in the province of Maputo in southern Mozambique.  He is married with no children.  He studied through the fourth grade and didn't continue due to the lack of financial resources.  He lives in his own home with his wife and doesn't support anyone else.

He has worked as an assistant at Bananalandia for more than 2 years.  He makes 2,100 meticals a month, which he puts towards his home's expenses.  He also saves some in his bank account.

He has never had a loan with another bank.  He became familiar with Hluvuku through a colleague who is also a client of the institution.  This is his first loan with Hluvuku in the amount of 8,000 meticals.  He will use it to buy construction materials for his home (sand, cement, stone, beams, etc.).

He promises to make his payments on time.  In the future, he wants to finish his home, for which he plans to request more loans from Hluvuku.

loans.use: to buy construction materials for his home (sand, cement, stone, beams, etc.).

loans.name: Chico

texts.pt:
Nasceu no Distrito de Manica, Província de mesmo nome, centro de Moçambique, casado e pai de 6 filhos, 4 destes ainda frequentam Escola. Fez o ensino superior e parou para iniciar a trabalhar. Vive na casa própria com a sua familia e não sustenta ninguém. 
		
Saiu de Manica para Maputo a fim de continuar com seus estudos, é docente há mais de 3 anos e tem um salário de 19.800,00mt por mês que aplica nas despesas de casa e poupa algum na sua conta bancária (BIM).

Já teve empréstimos noutros bancos (BIM) e pagou sem dificuldades, conheceu a Hluvuku através de um colega que também é cliente desta instituição. Este é o seu segundo empréstimo na Hluvuku no valor de 10.000.00mt, com qual pretende comprar material de construção para a obra da sua casa (ferro, areia, cimento, pedra e outros). O empréstimo anterior foi de 10.000,00mt aplicado na mesma actividade. 
Compromete se a pagar devidamente o empréstimo e no futuro pretende concluir a sua casa e adquirir uma viatura, para tal tenciona solicitar mais empréstimos a Hluvuku.
texts.en:
Chico was born in the district of Manica in the province of the same name in central Mozambique.  He is married and is the father of 6 children, 4 of whom are in school.  He started college and stopped to start working.  He lives in his own home with his family and doesn't support anyone else besides them.

He left Manica for Maputo to continue with his education.  He has been a teacher for more than 3 years.  He makes 19,800 meticals a month, which he puts towards his home's expenses.  He also saves some in his bank account at the BIM bank.

He has had loans with BIM, which he paid back without any problems.  He became familiar with Hluvuku through a colleage who is also a client of the institution.  This is his second loan with Hluvuku in the amount of 10,000 meticals, which he will use to buy construction materials for his home (iron, sand, cement, stone, etc.).  His previous loan was for 10,000 meticals, which was also put towards his home.

He promises to pay back his loan on time.  In the future, he wants to finish his home and acquire a vehicle, for which he plans on requesting more loans from Hluvuku.

loans.use: to buy construction materials for his home (iron, sand, cement, stone, etc.)

loans.name: Yania Isabel

texts.es:
Yania, de 36 años de edad , de oficio comerciante, ella se dedica a elaborar y vender tortillas de maíz. Este negocio lo inicio con ayuda de su familia , sus primeros clientes son las pulperías a las cuales ella le distribuye sus tortillas las cuales elabora desde muy tempranas horas de la mañana para que estén listas para el desayuno que es cuando sus clientes le hacen pedidos además de eso ella sale a vender de manera ambulante regresando por la tarde luego de una cansada u laboriosa jornada de trabajo vendiendo en las calles. 
Ella está solicitando el crédito para la compra de maíz, cal y leña, materia prima que utiliza para elaborar sus sabrosas y calientes tortillas de maíz. Uno de sus sueños lograr poner un puesto de comida para lograr conseguir otros ingresos y mejorar su nivel de vida.
texts.en: Yania, 36 years old, is a vendor who works making and selling corn tortillas.  She started this business with the help of her family.  Her first clients are grocery stores to which she distributes her tortillas that she makes very early in the morning so that they are ready for breakfast when her clients want them.  In addition to this she also goes out as a mobile vendor, returning late at night after a tiring and laborious day selling in the streets.  She is requesting a loan to buy corn, lime powder and firewood, raw materials that she uses to create her tasty and hot corn tortillas.  One of her small dreams is to be able to have a food stall in order to earn more income and improve her standard of life.

loans.use: to buy corn, lime powder and firewood.

loans.name: Antonio

texts.pt:
Nasceu no Distrito de Boane, Província de Maputo, sul de Moçambique, casado e pai de 4 filhos, 3 destes ainda frequentam Escola. Fez 10ª classe e continua com os seus estudos no tempo pois laboral. Vive na casa própria com a sua família e não sustenta ninguém. 
		
Trabalha como docente em Boane há mais de 14 anos e tem um salário de 4.200,00mt por mês que aplica nas despesas de casa e poupa algum na sua conta bancária (BIM).

Já teve empréstimos noutros bancos (BIM) e pagou sem dificuldades, conheceu a Hluvuku através de um colega amigo que também é cliente desta instituição. Este é o seu sexto empréstimo na Hluvuku no valor de 10.000.00mt, com qual pretende comprar material de construção para a obra da sua casa (portas, aros para janelas, vidros e outros). Os empréstimos anteriores foram de 6.860.00mt, 8.100.00mt,10.000,00mt, 10.000.00mt e 12.000.00mt todos aplicados na mesma actividade.
Compromete se a pagar devidamente o empréstimo e no futuro pretende concluir a sua casa para melhor confortar a sua familia, para tal tenciona solicitar mais empréstimos a Hluvuku.
texts.en:
Antonio was born in the district of Boane, in the province of Maputo in southern Mozambique.  He is married and is the father of 4 children, 3 of whom are in school.  He studied through 10th grade and didn't continue so he could work.  He lives in his own home with his family and doesn't support anyone else besides them.

He has worked as a teacher in Boane for more than 14 years.  He makes 4,200 meticals a month, which he puts towards his home's expenses.  He also saves some in his bank account at the BIM bank.

He has had loans with BIM and paid them back without any problems.  He became familiar with Hluvuku through a colleague and friend, who is also a client of the institution.  This is his sixth loan with Hluvuku in the amount of 10,000 meticals, which he will use to buy construction materials for his home (doors, window frames, glass, etc.).  His previous loans were for 6,860, 8,100, 10,000, 10,000, and 12,000 meticals, which were all put towards his home as well.

He promises to pay back his loan on time.  In the future, he wants to finish his home so his family will be more comfortable.  He plans on requesting more loans from Hluvuku to do this.

loans.use: to buy construction materials for his home (doors, window frames, glass, etc.).

loans.name: Dansou

texts.fr: Dansou est âgé de 41 ans et vit au Bénin. Dansou n’a pas fréquenté l’école. Dansou est marié à une revendeuse du nom de Félicité. Le couple a cinq enfants à leur charge dont quatre constituent leurs propres enfants. Tous les enfants sont scolarisés. Dansou vit ensemble avec ses enfants et sa femme. Le couple assure ensemble les diverses charges de la maison. Pour répondre aux divers besoins de la maison, Dansou exerce la menuiserie depuis une dizaine d’année. Dansou s’approvisionne en madriers dans une ville du Benin. Grâce aux revenus que lui génère cette activité, Dansou contribue aux différentes dépenses de sa maison. Pour satisfaire aux besoins de sa clientèle de plus en plus grandissante, Dansou sollicite pour une troisième fois un crédit auprès de  ALIDé. Les crédits reçus antérieurement par Dansou ont été bien remboursés.
texts.en:
Dansou is 41 years old and lives in Benin.  He never went to school.  He is married to Félicité, a reseller.  Dansou and  Félicité have five children in their care, four of whom are their own children.  All the children go to school.  Dansou lives with his wife and children.  The couple jointly takes care of the various household expenses.

To meet the various needs of the household, Dansou has been working as a carpenter for about ten years.  He buys wood beams in a town in Benin.  Thanks to the income generated by this activity, Dansou contributes to the family's various expenses.

In order to meet the needs of an increasingly larger number of customers, Dansou is requesting a third loan from  ALIDé.  The loans that he had previously received have been well repaid.

loans.use: to buy wood beams for carpentry.

loans.name: Antokia Group

texts.en:
Hobokela,who is in her early 60s is married with two children who are still at the college.  She has been running a Genge-Duka (Retail shop together with fruits and vegetables) since 2005.  She works from 6.30 am to 9.30 pm daily and is able to make a good monthly profit.

This will be her 5th loan from Tujijenge Tanzania.  She used the previous loans to buy the missing items in the genge-duka, paid college fees for her children and has paid back all loans successfully.  She wants a loan to increase on the genge-duka stock to resell. Her dream is to one day be able to build her own house.

She will share this loan with her loan group "Antokia" which has a total of 14 members who will hold each other accountable for paying back their loans.

loans.use: to increase on  Genge-Duka stock to resell.

loans.name: Gracelyn

texts.en:
Gracelyn is 42 years old and separated.  

Gracelyn runs a rice retail business in the Philippines and requested a PHP 15,000 loan through NWTF to purchase additional sacks of rice to sell.

Gracelyn has been in this business for 10 years.

In the future, Gracelyn would like to save money to expand her business.

loans.use: To purchase additional sacks of rice to sell

loans.name: Mariam

texts.en:
Mariam lives in Kampala, Uganda.  She is married and has three children, two of whom attend school.  She also takes care of additional family members (elderly mother).  Mariam lives in a home that she rents.  She has access to electricity but does not have access to running water.  Her major monthly expenses include rent, food and school fees.

Mariam has a business, frying chips and selling them to retail customers at the market.  She has been in this business for three years and she works seven days out of every week.  Mariam has requested a loan of 100,000 Ugandan Shillings from MCDT SACCO, which she will use to buy more bags of Irish potatoes and cooking oil.  The main business challenges Mariam faces include the increasing prices of both cooking oil and Irish potatoes and thieves. 

Her goals and aspirations for her business are to own a fully stocked restaurant and to employ two girls to assist in the work.

loans.use: to buy more cooking oil and Irish potatoes for fryiong chips.

loans.name: Grace

texts.en: Grace lives in Kampala, Uganda. She is married and has two children, all of whom are in school. She also takes care of additional family members. Grace has a business of selling fish. She has been in this business for two years, and she works seven days out of every week. Grace sells her products from home, by means of retail. Grace has requested for a loan of 100,000 Ugandan shillings (UGX) from MCDT SACCO, which she will use to buy more boxes of fish. The main business challenges for Grace includes scarcity of fish and increasing prices of fish. Her goals and aspirations for her business are to become a wholesaler, to educate her children up to university level, and also to build her own house. Grace lives in a home that she rents; she has access to electricity and doesn't have access to piped water. Her major monthly expenses include rent, feeding the family .

loans.use: To buy more boxes of fish

loans.name: Becham Group

texts.en:
Elizabeth, who is in her early 50s, is married with two children who are still going to school. She has been running a "Genge-Duka" (a retail shop providing fruits and vegetables in the same shop) and supplying food in two different bars for 10 years now. She works from 6:00 a.m. to 11:00 p.m. daily and is able to make a good monthly profit.  

This will be her 4th loan from Tujijenge Tanzania. She used the previous loans to build a foundation for the house she is about to start building, bought the missing items in the Genge-Duka, bought a big cooking stove for cooking food, and paid for household expenses. She has paid back the loans successfully.  She wants a loan to increase the stock in the Genge-Duka and to build a room for cooking food. Her dream is to one day be able to sell drinks and clothes.

She will share this loan with her loan group "Becham" which has a total of 15 members who will hold each other accountable for paying back their loans.

loans.use: to increase the stock in the Genge-Duka and to build a room for cooking food

loans.name: Nelson

texts.pt:
Nasceu no Distrito de Boane, Província de Maputo, sul de Moçambique, casado e pai de 3 filhos, destes o mais velho frequenta Escola. Fez 12ª classe e não continuou devido a falta de condicoes financeiras. Vive na casa própria com a sua família e não sustenta ninguém. 
		
Tem um negocio próprio de criacao de frangos de corte há mais de 3 anos e tem um rendimento de cerca de 8.000.00mt por mês que aplica nas despesas de casa e poupa algum na sua conta bancária.

Já teve empréstimos noutros bancos (BIM) e pagou sem dificuldades, conheceu a Hluvuku através de um amigo que também é cliente desta instituição. Este é o seu terceiro empréstimo na Hluvuku no valor de 10.000.00mt, com qual pretende comprar pintos, rações e vitaminas para aumentar a quantidade da sua produção. Os empréstimos anteriores foram de 7.000.00mt e 8.000.00mt todos aplicados na mesma actividade.
Compromete se a pagar devidamente o empréstimo e no futuro pretende construir uma casa condigna e investir nos estudos dos filhos, para tal tenciona solicitar mais empréstimos a Hluvuku.
texts.en:
Nelson was born in the district of Boane in the province of Maputo in southern Mozambique.  He is married and is the father of 3 children. The oldest one is in school.  Nelson studied through the 12th grade and didn't continue due to the lack of financial resources.  He lives in his own home with his family and doesn't support anyone else besides them.

He has had his own business raising chickens for more than 3 years.  He makes close to 8,000 meticals per month, which he puts towards his home's expenses.  He also saves some in his bank account.

He has had loans through other banks (BIM), and he paid them back without any problems.  He became familiar with Hluvuku through a friend who is also a client of the institution.  This is his third loan with Hluvuku, and it is for 10,000 meticals.  He will use it to buy chicks, feed, and vitamins to increase his production.  His previous loans were for 7,000 and 8,000 meticals, which also went towards his business.

He promises to pay back his loan on time.  In the future, he hopes to build a decent home and invest in the education of his children.  He would like to request more loans from Hluvuku to do this.

loans.use: to buy chicks, feed, and vitamins.

loans.name: Mariam

texts.en:
Mariam lives in Kampala, Uganda. She is married and has two children, all of whom are in school. She also takes care of additional family members (brother children). Mariam has a business of selling charcoal. She has been in this business for two years, and she works seven days out of every week. 

Mariam sells her products at the market by means of retail. Mariam has requested  for a loan of 100,000 Ugandan shillings (UGX) from MCDT SACCO, which she will use to buy more bags of charcoal. The main business challenges for Mariam include thieves  and seasonality. Her goals and aspirations for her business are to become a wholesaler and also to educate her children up to university level. Mariam lives in a home that she rents; she has access to electricity and doesn't have access to piped water. Her major monthly expenses include rent, feeding the family .

loans.use: To buy more bags of charcoal

loans.name: Thimontée

texts.fr: Thimontée est âgé de 48 ans et vit au Benin. Thimontée n’a pas fréquenté l’école. Thimontée est marié à une marchande du nom Honorine. Le couple a cinq enfants à leur charge dont quatre constituent leurs propres enfants. Tous les enfants sont scolarisés. Thimontée vit ensemble avec sa femme et ses enfants. Le couple assure ensemble les diverses charges de la maison. Thimontée mène comme activité la soudure depuis vingt six ans. Thimontée s’approvisionne en matériels de soudure dans une ville du Benin. Dans la quête de la satisfaction de sa clientèle et en vue d’améliorer son activité, Thimontée sollicite un troisième crédit auprès de ALIDé. Les crédits reçus antérieurement ont été bien remboursés.
texts.en:
Thimontée is 48 years old and lives in Benin.  He never went to school.  He is married to a seller named Honorine.  Thimontée and Honorine have five children in their care, four of whom are their own children.  All the children go to school.  Thimontée lives with his wife and children.  The couple jointly takes care of the various household expenses.

Thimontée has been working as a welder for the past twenty-six years.  He buys welding supplies in a town in Benin.

In order to satisfy the needs of his customers and to improve his activity, he is requesting a third loan from ALIDé.  His previous loans have been well repaid.

loans.use: to buy steel sheets, pipes etc. for welding.

loans.name: Julius

texts.en:
Julius is married with six children, all of whom attend school. He lives in a rental house that has electricity but not piped water. His greatest monthly expense is food for the family.

Julius has operated a business selling natural health products from door to door and from home. He faces a major challenge of seasonality in his business. He dreams of becoming a wholesale supplier of health products in the future.

With the KSHS 30,000, he wants to purchase bundles of natural medicine products for sale. He decided to join Yehu to access loans to boost his business.

loans.use: to purchase bundles of natural medicine products to sell

loans.name: Emelina Esperanza

texts.es:
Emelina Esperanza es nacida y criada en el municipio de El Sauce, desde muy joven se ha dedicado a laborar como maestra de primaria para llevar el pan de cada día a su hogar y como madre soltera le tocó educar y asumir el rol de padre para sus dos hijos, por lo que tiene gran experiencia en la educación de menores y es un oficio que merece un gran reconocimiento porque como nicaragüense está aportando un granito de arena a diario en la enseñanza de estos niños que son el futuro de nuestro País.
Con el pequeño salario que gana con esta profesión no puede cubrir todos los gastos necesarios que conlleva un hogar como el pagar una empleada doméstica por lo que después de laborar tiene que realizar los quehaceres en su vivienda por lo que no le da mucho el tiempo.
Por tal razón solicita su segundo crédito para comprar una lavadora y así reducir tiempo para cubrir todo lo necesario.
texts.en: Emelina Esperanza was born and raised in the municipality of El Sauce.  Since she was very young she has worked as a primary school teacher and as the breadwinner in her home.  As a single mother she also has to educate and assume the role of parent for her two children, and thus has great experience in educating children. This is a profession that deserves great recognition because as a Nicaraguan she is bringing one grain of sand every day to the education of these children, who are the future of our country.  With the small salary that she earns in her profession she cannot meet all of the costs necessary in the household such as paying a domestic employee.  Therefore after work she has to do all of the housework in the home, although she does not have much time.  For this reason she is requesting her second loan, to buy a washing machine and thus reduce the time needed to to all that is necessary.

loans.use: to buy a washing machine.

loans.name: Jamila

texts.en: Jamila is a married woman with two children, one of whom is attending school. She operates a tailoring business and her primary customers include the neighbors and the general public. She has been in this business for five years and she dreams of opening a boutique in the future. Jamila lives in a rental house that has both electricity and piped water. She intends to use the loan of KSH 50,000 to purchase another sewing machine and some material (fabric).

loans.use: to purchase another sewing machine and some fabric

loans.name: Siuila

texts.en:
Siuila is 59 years old and married with five children.
 
She has a small garden where she grows taro that she can sell in her community or at the market. She has been doing this for 10 years. Siuila needs a loan to buy chemicals, a plant sprayer, etc.
 
She has been a member of SBPD since 2011. Siuila will use the profits from her sales to improve her business and support her family.

loans.use: to buy chemicals, a plant sprayer, etc

loans.name: Aboudou Gafarou

texts.fr: Aboudou Gafarou est âgé 46 ans et vit au Benin. Aboudou Gafarou a arrêté l’école au niveau primaire. Aboudou Gafarou est marié à une marchande du nom Yvette. Le couple a six enfants à leur charge dont trois constituent leurs propres enfants. Certains enfants sont scolarisés. Aboudou Gafarou vit ensemble avec sa femme et ses enfants. Le couple assure ensemble les diverses charges de la maison. Aboudou Gafarou mène comme activité la menuiserie dans son atelier depuis treize ans. Aboudou Gafarou s’approvisionne en madriers dans une ville du Benin.  Dans la quête de la meilleure satisfaction de sa clientèle et en vue d’améliorer son  activité, Aboudou Gafarou sollicite un troisième crédit auprès de ALIDé.  Les crédits reçus antérieurement  ont été bien remboursés.
texts.en:
Aboudou Gafarou is 46 years old and living in Bénin.  He has a primary level education.  Aboudou Gafarou is married to a tradeswoman named Yvette.  The couple has six children in their care, three of whom are their own. Several of the children are attending school. He lives together with his wife and children.  Aboudou and his wife both work to provide for the various needs of the household. 

Aboudou Gafarou has been running a woodworking business out of his workshop for thirteen years.   
He stocks up on timber at a town in Bénin.

In the quest to bring the greatest satisfaction to his customers and envisioning the improvement of his business,  Aboudou Gafarou is asking for his third loan via ALIDé.  The previously issued loans were properly repaid.

loans.use: to purchase timber for woodworking.

loans.name: Rosalina

texts.en:
Rosalina is 39 years old and married with four children.
 
She has a small garden where she grows taro that she can sell in her community or at the market. She has been doing this for many years. Rosalina needs a loan to buy chemicals, a plant sprayer, etc.

She has been a member of SBPD since 2011. Rosalina will use the profits from her sales to improve her business.

loans.use: to buy chemicals, a plant sprayer, etc

loans.name: Marta

texts.es:
Marta habita en una comunidad   del municipio de El Sauce donde ha vivido toda su vida, se dedica al comercio ambulante donde ofrece variedad de verduras y lácteos a sus clientes quienes en su mayoría son los habitantes de dicha comarca.
Dicha actividad le ha permitido mejorar su vivienda y generar sus propios ingresos para cubrir sus gastos del hogar.
Tiene seis años de trabajar con Ceprodel y le han otorgado ocho créditos todos para invertirlos en su negocio.
Hoy en la actualidad necesita un crédito para comprar un molino con el objetivo de brindar este servicio en esta comunidad aprovechando la ventaja que no hay negocio de este tipo y los habitantes tienen que viajar hasta el poblado del Sauce para poder usar este servicio.
Confía en Dios y ceprodel que su solicitud sea aprobada para poder llevar a cabo su objetivo y ayudar a estos pobladores a que tengan este servicio y ahorren tiempo.
texts.en: Marta lives in a community in the municipality of El Sauce where she has lived all of her life.  She works as a mobile vendor selling a variety of vegetables and dairy products.  The majority of her clients are residents of the district.This activity has allowed her to improve her home and to earn her own income to cover the household costs. She has worked for six years with Ceprodel and they have granted her other loans to invest in her business. She now needs a loan to buy a mill with the objective of providing this service in the community.  She is taking advantage of the fact that there is no such business in her community and the residents must travel to the town of Sauce to use the service there. She trusts in God and in Ceprodel that her request will be approved so that she can achieve her objective and help these residents to have this service and thereby to save time.

loans.use: to buy a mill

loans.name: Losivale

texts.en:
Losivale is 23 years old and married with two children.
 
She has a small garden where she grows taro that she can sell in her community or at the market. She has been doing this for many years. Losivale needs a loan to buy chemicals and a plant sprayer. 

She has been a member of SPBD since 2011. Losivale will use the profits from her sales to improve her business and help her family with their daily needs.

loans.use: to buy chemicals, a plant sprayer, etc

loans.name: Leti

texts.en:
Leti is 19 years old and single with no children.
 
She has a small garden where she grows taro that she can sell in her community or at the market. She has been doing this for three years. Leti needs a loan to improve her business.
 
She has been a member of SPBD since 2011. Leti will use the profits from her sales to upgrade her living conditions.

loans.use: to buy chemicals, a plant sprayer, etc

loans.name: Roseann

texts.en: Roseann is 45 years old and married with three children. She runs a small business selling steamed rice with fried chicken, chicken curry and much more in her community. She has been doing this for one year. Roseann has requested a loan to set up her business. She joined SPBD in 2012 to gain access to capital. With her earnings, Roseann will try to establish more food stalls within every school.

loans.use: to buy some containers, a gas oven, food covers, tongs, spoons, knives, plates, cooked rice, fried chicken, sugar, flour etc

loans.name: Maoiai

texts.en:
Maoiai is 52 years old and married with seven children. 

She has a small garden where she grows taro that she can sell in her community or at the market. She has been doing this for many years. Maoiai needs a loan to purchase chemicals and equipment for her plantation.
 
She has been a member of SPBD since 2011. Maoiai will use the profits from her sales to improve her business.

loans.use: to buy chemicals, a plant sprayer, etc

loans.name: Claudia De Los Angeles

texts.es:
Claudia  de los Ángeles es originaria del municipio de Santa Rosa del Peñón, como madre soltera es responsable de la buena educación y alimentación de sus dos hijos por eso trabaja arduamente y lucha día a día para llevarles el sustento y todo lo necesario para el buen crecimiento de sus niños.
Labora de lunes a viernes en una comunidad cercana a dicho municipio como maestra de educación primaria donde tiene varios años de dedicarse a este oficio a enseñarles a los niños a leer y escribir los cuales son el futuro de nuestro país.
Se acercó por primera vez a Ceprodel para solicitar un crédito para la compra de zinc ya que su objetivo es cambiar el techo de su vivienda el cual está en mal estado y aprovechar antes de que entre la época del invierno.
Confía en Dios que su solicitud sea aprobada para cumplir su objetivo y brindarles a sus hijos mejores condiciones en su hogar.
texts.en: Claudia de los Angeles is from the municipality of Santa Rosa del Penon.  As a single mother she is responsible for raising and feeding her two children and thus works very hard and fights daily to bring them sustenance and all that is necessary for the proper raising of children.  She works from Monday to Friday in a community close to her municipality as a primary school teacher.  She has worked for a number of years in this position, teaching children to read and write as they are the future of our country.  She approached Ceprodel for the first time to request a loan to buy zinc (for roofing), as her objective is to replace the roof on her house, which is in a bad state, before the winter season begins.  She trust in God that her request will be approved so that she can achieve her objective and provide her children with better conditions in the home.

loans.use: to buy zinc (for roofing)

loans.name: Edjromede Group

texts.fr: Le groupe EDJROMEDE est composé de trois personnes qui résident dans le même quartier. La représentante du groupe du nom de Sourou Philomène est celle qui a la main levée sur la photo.Sourou Philomène est âgée de 54 ans et vit au Bénin. Sourou Philomène n’a pas fréquenté l’école. Sourou Philomène est mariée à un jardinier du nom de Victor. Le couple a cinq enfants dont trois sont à leur charge. Tous les enfants sont scolarisés. Sourou Philomène vit ensemble avec ses enfants et son mari. Le couple assure ensemble les diverses charges de la maison. Pour répondre aux divers besoins de la maison, Sourou Philomène vend de maïs, du poisson et de l’huile d’arachide à son domicile depuis trente cinq ans. Sourou Philomène s’approvisionne dans un marché du Benin. Grâce aux revenus que lui génère cette activité, Sourou Philomène contribue aux différentes dépenses de sa maison. Pour satisfaire aux besoins de sa clientèle de plus en plus grandissante, Sourou Philomène sollicite pour une cinquième fois un crédit auprès de  ALIDé ensemble avec les autres membres du groupe EDJROMEDE. Les crédits reçus antérieurement ont été bien remboursés.
texts.en:
The Edjromede Group comprises three women who live in the same neighbourhood.  The representative of the group, Sourou Philomène, is pictured here with her hand raised.  Sourou Philomène is 54 years old and lives in Bénin.  She has not attended school. 
Sourou Philomène is married to a gardener named Victor.  The couple has five children, three of whom are in their care. All of the children are attending school.  Sourou Philomène lives together with her husband and children.  The couple works together to provide for the different needs of the household.

In order to meet the various needs of the household, Sourou Philomène has been selling corn, fish, and peanut oil from her home for five years.  She buys her stock at a market in Bénin.  Thanks to the profits she has earned through this business, she contributed to the various expenses of her household.

To satisfy her ever-growing clientele, Sourou Philomène is asking for a loan via ALIDé for the fifth time along with the other members of the Edjeromede Group. The previously issued loans were properly repaid.

loans.use: to purchase fish, corn, and peanut oil.

loans.name: Vaai

texts.en: Vaai is 23 years old and married with one child. She runs a small business selling fish in her community and has been doing this for two years. Vaai has requested a loan to buy new fishing equipment. She joined SPBD in 2011 to gain access to capital. With her earnings, Vaai will use her profits for her family's well-being.

loans.use: to buy fishing nets, a canoe, a spear, flip flops, goggles, etc

loans.name: Sosaiete

texts.en: Sosaiete is a 39-year-old woman who is single with no children. She has a small business sewing clothes. She has four years of experience with this business. Sosaiete needs a loan to buy new parts for her sewing machine and other sewing supplies. She will use her profits for the betterment of her family. Sosaiete joined SPBD in 2010 to gain access to financial services.

loans.use: to purchase spare parts for her sewing machine, new fabric, fabric paint, needles and thread

loans.name: Hatesa

texts.en: Hatesa is a 27-year-old married woman with four children. She makes and sells baked goodies such as, cream buns, donuts, cookies and biscuits in her community to earn a living. She has two years of experience with this business. Hatesa needs a loan to buy new ingredients and a new oven. She plans to use her profits to ensure a better future for her children. Hatesa has been a member of SPBD since 2012.

loans.use: to buy flour, oil and a new cement oven

loans.name: María Salvadora

texts.es:
Doña Salvadora inició su negocio con un pequeño capital que le regaló su esposo para que se dedicara a una actividad que le generara sus propios ingresos.
Esta actividad consiste en la venta de ropa variada para damas y caballeros la cual tiene muchísimos años de ejercerla donde tiene gran experiencia y donde ha ganado mucha clientela por su buen trato y los precios bajos de la mercadería que ofrece.
Tiene seis años de trabajar con Ceprodel donde le han otorgado 6 créditos para invertirlos siempre en su negocio lo que agradece este apoyo incondicional ya que gracias a ello ha mantenido su negocio el que le ha permitido preparar a su único hijo como profesional para que se defienda en la vida en un futuro.
Con este crédito pretende adquirir pantalones de varón, de mujer, blusas, capri, faldas, sandalias y camisas de varón con el fin de satisfacer la demanda de sus clientes y atraer a nuevos.
texts.en: Salvadora began her business with a small amount of capital given to her by her husband, so that she could work and earn her own income.  This activity consists of selling a variety of clothing for women and men.  She has been doing this for many years and has much experience, and has gained many customers due to her good treatment and the low prices of the merchandise that she offers.  She has been working with Ceprodel for six years, and they have approved 6 loans which she always invests in her business.  She is grateful for this unconditional support as it has allowed her to maintain her business and to train her only son as a professional so that he can support himself in his future life.  With this loan she plans to acquire men's pants, women's blouses, capris, skirts, and sandals, and men's shirts, with the intention of satisfying the demands of her customers and attracting new ones.

loans.use: to buy men's trousers, women's blouses, capris, skirts and sandals, and men's shirts.

loans.name: Yerlin José

texts.es:
El joven Yerlin José es originario del municipio de El Sauce, se desempeña como Guarda de Seguridad  de dicho municipio desde hace varios años. Su única responsabilidad es velar por su madre y brindarle las mejores condiciones del hogar.
Hoy en la actualidad tiene la necesidad de adquirir un préstamo para pagar gastos de salud de su querida madrecita y tenerla sana ya que con su bajo salario no puede cubrir estos costos altos de pagar consultas y adquirir medicamentos.
Tiene tres años de trabajar con Ceprodel donde ha obtenido 5 créditos todos le han beneficiado porque gracias a ello ha resuelto problemas de salud y ha mejorado un poco su vivienda.
texts.en:
Young man Yerlin Jose is a native of the town of El Sauce. He has worked as a security guard in said town for many years. His only responsibility is to take care of his mother and provide her the best home conditions.

Today, currently, he needs to acquire a loan to pay for health care for his dear mother and have her healthy since with his low salary he cannot cover the costs to pay doctors and acquire medicines.

He has worked with Ceprodel for three years where he has obtained five loans. All have been beneficial. Thanks to that, he has resolved health problems and has improved his house a bit.

loans.use: to pay for medical expenses.

loans.name: Yulisa Liseth

texts.es:
Yulisa Liseth actualmente desempeña el cargo de contadora en un ministerio de salud. Es una joven soltera con un hijo bajo su cargo, donde esto la ha motivado a seguir luchando, se le presento la oportunidad de conocer que  Ceprodel que apoyaba a las personas con créditos para su desarrollo.

Por esta razón,  se presentó para solicitar un crédito para la compra de una refrigeradora estando consciente que logrará obtener mejores condiciones de vida en su familia y saldrá adelante esto la motiva a seguir luchando en sus labores que enfrenta día a día
texts.en:
Yulisa Liseth currently holds the post of accountant in the Ministry of Health. She is a young single mother caring for a son, which has motivated her to keep fighting. An opportunity was presented to her to learn how CEPRODEL supports people with loans for their development.

For this reason, she came to ask for a loan for the purchase of a refrigerator, as she recognizes that she will gain better living conditions for her family and get ahead. This motivates her to keep fighting in the work that she faces day to day.

loans.use: to buy a refrigerator.

loans.name: Busarima

texts.ru:
Бусариме 54 года, замужем, воспитала 6 детей. Бусарима с 2000 года занимается полеводством и животноводством, начав этот бизнес со стартовой суммы 35,000 сом (KGS). В хозяйстве Бусаримы на сегодняшний  день имеется  5 дойных коров, 3 теленка, 2 лошади, доходы от продажи молока составляют 5,000 сом в месяц.
В целях дальнейшего развития своего бизнеса, Бусарима обратилась в компанию «Бай –Тушум и Партнеры» за кредитом в сумме 50,000 сом (KGS)  на закуп 2 бычков для отправки на пастбище.  Доходы от кредита Бусарима планирует вложить в дальнейшее увеличение хозяйства.
texts.en:
Burasima is 54 years old, married and has raised six children. Burasima has been doing field crop cultivation and animal husbandry since 2000 which she had started with the capital of 35,000 som (KGS). Now her livestock consists of five milk cows, three calves, two horses and the income from the sale of milk which is 5,000 a month. 

With the goal to further develop her business Burasima has come to Bai Tushum and Partners for a loan in the amount of 50,000 KGS to buy two calves for pasture grazing. Burasima plans to invest the income from the loan to further increase her livestock.

loans.use: to purchase cattle.

loans.name: Diana Valeska

texts.es:
La joven Diana Valeska es originaria del municipio de Santa Rosa del Peñón, es madre de un niño que está en edad escolar, se gana la vida laborando como maestra de primaria la cual tiene varios años de dedicarse a este oficio el cual le permite llevar el pan de cada día a su hogar y ayudarle a su esposo con dichos gastos.
Su objetivo de solicitar su primer crédito en Ceprodel es porque quieren iniciar a construir su propia vivienda ya que actualmente viven en casa de su mamá por lo que poco  a poco adquirirán los materiales necesarios para tal construcción.
Este crédito será invertido en la compra de bloques como primer paso ya que es el material esencial y el que lleva más para la construcción de una vivienda confiando en Ceprodel le apoyen con esta solicitud.
texts.en:
Young Diana Valeska is a native of the town of Santa Rosa del Penon. She is mother to a son who is school age. She makes a living working as a primary school teacher. She has many years experience in this job which allows her to bring the daily bread home and help her husband with the bills.

Her objective in requesting her first loan from Ceprodel is because she wants to start to built her own house since currently she lives in the house of her mother. For this, she will gradually acquire the necessary materials for the construction.

This loan will be invested in the purchase of blocks, as a first step, since it is essential material and it takes more to build a house. She is hoping Ceprodel will suppot her with this request.

loans.use: to buy blocks.

loans.name: Candelario José

texts.es:
Candelario José es sauceño de nacimiento hijo de una señora humilde y trabajadora que le ha inculcado los mejores valores como madre soltera. Hoy en la actualidad él vela por darle una mejor vida a su madre y lucha día a día laborando en una Institución de este poblado para llevarle el pan de cada día ya que es su único familiar que tiene que ver por ella.
Tiene seis años de trabajar con Ceprodel donde le han otorgado ocho créditos todos para mejorarle la vivienda a su querida madrecita con el fin de que tenga mejores condiciones de vida.
Está solicitando su octavo crédito para la compra de ladrillos y cemento para ampliar un poco más dicha vivienda, esperando y confiando en Dios que esta Institución le apoye siempre con su solicitud ya que es la única manera de poder llevar a cabo sus planes porque con su pequeño salario solo alcanza para los gastos del hogar.
texts.en: Candelario Jose was born in El Sauce and is the son of a humble and hardworking woman who has instilled in her son the best values as a single mother. Now he strives to provide his mother with a better life and struggles day by day working in an institution in the town in order to bring her her daily bread, as she is his only relative and she must look after her.  For six years he has worked with Ceprodel, and they have granted him eight other loans, all to improve the home he shares with his dear mother so that she wil have better living conditions.  He is requesting his eighth loan to buy bricks and cement in orer to enlarge the house a bit more, hoping and trusting in God that the institution will still support him in his request as it is the only way he has to carry out his plans because his small salary is only enough to meet the household expenses.

loans.use: to buy bricks and cement.

loans.name: Evila

texts.es: Evila de 67 años de edad, habita sola en casa familiar. Ella se dedica al comercio de  prendas de vestir. Instalo su negocio en su misma casa y vende variedad de faldas, vestidos, pantalones, blusas y otras prendas de vestir que atraen a los clientes.  ha trabajado toda su vida para poder ganarse el alimento diario ya que no cuenta con otra entrada de ingresos por lo que su deseo es mantener activo su negocio por mucho más tiempo ya que es la única y principal fuente de ingresos que posee.  Ella es una mujer emprendedora, dedicada y carismática en su trabajo. Muchas personas la prefieren ya que en su negocio siempre hay variedad de prendas de vestir y lo mejor de todo a precios muy accesibles.  Gracias a su experiencia y buen servicio a los clientes ha logrado ganarse su confianza, que cada día la prefieren más.  Tomó la decisión de solicitar este crédito a INTEGRAL para invertir en su negocio en la compra de prendas  de vestir al por mayor y en mas variedad tales como: faldas, vestidos, pantalones, blusas, ropa interior y de más prendas que ayuden a atraer a más clientes. Todo esto lo hace con el fin de mantener surtido su negocio para que los clientes siempre encuentren lo que buscan. Evila cuenta con mucha experiencia en el manejo de crédito y a sido gracias a financiamientos anteriores y el buen manejo que ella ha tenido de los mismos que su negocio va creciendo. Espera con éste nuevo préstamo aumentar sus ganancias que le permitan mejorar su calidad de vida.
texts.en: Evila is 67 years old. She lives alone in her family home. She is dedicated to selling clothing. She started her business in her own home and sells a variety of skirts, dresses, pants, blouses and other outfits that attract customers. She has worked her entire life to be able to earn the daily bread since she has no other income and for which her wish is to keep her business active longer since it is the only and principle source of income that she possesses. She is an entrepreneurial woman, dedicated and charismatic in her job. Many people prefer her since, in her business, she always has variety in her clothing and the best at accessible prices. Thanks to her experience and good service to customers, she gained their trust and every day they prefer her more. She decided to request this loan from Integral to invest for her business in the purchase of clothing at wholesale prices and in greater variety such as skirts, dresses, pants, blouses, underwear and more that helps attract more customers. She does all of this with the goal if keeping her business stocked so customers always find what they want. Evila has a lot of experience in managing loans and has received funding previously and her good management of those loans has seen her business grow. She hopes to expand her earnings with this new loan which will allow her to improve her quality of life.

loans.use: to purchase skirts, dresses, pants, blouses, underwear, etc.

loans.name: Ana Miriam

texts.es: Ana Miriam de 48 años de edad, habita en casa de su propiedad junto con sus dos hijos los cuales se encuentran estudiando. Ella se dedica  a la venta de sartenes de teflón y de presión. La venta la realiza de manera ambulante en las diferentes zonas donde ella habita y también realiza la venta en su casa de habitación. Tiene muchos años de dedicarse a este negocio por lo que ya cuenta con mucha experiencia  en el área.  Sus vecinos dan buenas referencias de su trabajo y de su persona ya que es muy trabajadora, responsable y carismática. Para ella lo más importante es su familia  principalmente sus hijos los cuales son su principal inspiración para seguir luchando por darles una calidad de vida diferente. Debido a que ya cuenta con muchos clientes fijos ha decidió invertir en la compra de sartenes de teflón y de presión al por mayor ya que muchas veces se queda desabastecida y prefiere hacer una sola compra y estar preparada  cuando los clientes soliciten sus productos. Es por esta razón que se acerco a INTEGRAL con la idea de que le aprueben este crédito y poder realizar la inversión. Además sueña con dar a sus hijos los estudios que les permitan accesar a un futuro mas prometedor.
texts.en: Ana Miriam is 48 years old. She lives in a house on her property along with her two children who are students. She is dedicated to selling teflon pans and pressure cookers. She sells on foot in different areas where she lives and also sells from her home. She has dedicated herself to this business for many years so she has a lot of experience in the area. Her neighbors give good references about her work and her person since she is very hard working, responsible and charismatic. For her, what is most important is her family, mainly her children who are her main inspiration for continuing to fight to give them a different quality of life. Since she already has many fixed customers, she has decided to invest in the purchase of teflon pans and pressure cookers at wholesale since many times they are unserved and prefer to make only one purchase and she wants to be prepared for when the customers request her products. It is for this rerason that she approached Integral with the idea to approve this loan and to be able to make the investment. Additionally, her dream is to give her children the education that allows them to have a more promising future.

loans.use: to purchase teflon pans and pressure cookers..

loans.name: Nelly Esmeralda

texts.es: Nelly Esmeralda de veinticinco años de edad vive junto a sus padres y su hijo, Ella se dedica a la venta de tortillas en el lugar donde reside ya tiene algún tiempo con el negocio, es muy conocida en la zona pues prepara las tortillas más ricas y con el servicio más rápido además que están elaboradas con material de primera calidad y las vende a precio accesible; Nelly es una mujer joven entregada a su labor y con sus objetivos bien definidos quiere alcanzar sus sueños y está esforzándose mucho por ello, piensa que siempre hay que comenzar el camino de la forma más inteligente y con la inspiración del corazón, él está dispuesto a terminar ese camino es por eso que se decidió a solicitarle a INTEGRAL un crédito que le permita comprar maíz por mayor, con el objetivo de disminuir el costo de su principal materia prima y que ello signifique un mayor margen en sus ganancias. Nelly Esmeralda tiene la seguridad que así podrá garantizarle a su familia seguridad económica.-
texts.en: Nelly Esmeralda, 25 years old, lives with her parents and her son. She is dedicated to selling tortillas in the place where she lives. Since she already has some time with this business, she is well known in the area since she prepares the most delicious tortillas and has the quickest service. Additionally, she makes them with top quality ingredients and sells them at an accessible price. Nelly is a young woman dedicated to her work and, with her well defined goals, she wants to achieve her dreams and she is working hard for this. She thinks that she always has to start in the most intelligent way and with inspiration from the heart. She is committed to finish this path. It is for this that she has decided to request from Integral a loan that allows her to buy maize at wholesale with the objective of lowering the price of her main ingredient that will mean a greater margin in her earnings. Nelly Esmeralda is sure that that will be able to guarantee economic security for her family.

loans.use: to buy maize at wholesale.

loans.name: Edwin Alexander

texts.es: Edwin Alexander de treinta y tres años de edad vive junto a  su compañera de vida, el posee un taller de zapatería en su misma casa de residencia, situada en zona semiurbana al occidente del país, arregla toda clase de zapatos, tacones, zapatillas, tenis, sandalias entre otros,tanto para hombre como mujer, tiene varios años de experiencia en su labor, es muy conocido en la zona  y se ha hecho de mucha clientela pues su trabajo es de primera calidad y tiene precios accesibles, además el servicio es de los mejores las personas siempre quedan satisfechas con la amabilidad de Edwin; es un hombre emprendedor y muy soñador, siempre está dispuesto a aprovechar todas las oportunidades que se le presentan, piensa que la vida es un sueño y quiere alcanzarlo es por eso que se decidió a solicitarle a INTEGRAL un crédito que le permita comprar cuero, suelas, hilos agujas etc. Edwin Alexander tiene la confianza que así podrá darle a su familia una mejor calidad de vida.
texts.en: Edwin Alexander, 33 years old, lives with his spouse. He has a shoe shop in his own home, located in a semiurban area in the west of the country. He fixes all types of shoes: heels, slippers, tennis shoes, sandals, among others, as much for men as for women. He has many years of experience in his work. He is well known in the area and he has a lot of customers since his work is of top quality and he has accessible prices. Additionally, his services is the best. People are always satisfied with Edwin's amiability. He is an entrepreneurial man and a big daydreamer. He is always ready to take advantage of all of the opportunities that present themselves.  He thinks that life is a dream and he wants to take advantage of it. It is for this that he has decided to request from Integral a loan that allows him to buy leather, soles, thread, needles, etc. Edwin Alexander has the trust that in this way he will be able to give his family a better quality of life.

loans.use: to buy leather, soles, thread, needles.

loans.name: Sulma Judith

texts.es: Sulma Judith de veintinueve años de edad vive junto a su hija, ella se dedica a la venta de ropa en lugar de su residencia y de forma ambulante va casa por casa ofreciendo sus productos, tiene variedad de prendas para damas, caballeros niñas y niños con estilo casual pantalones, faldas, vestidos entre otros, quiere aumentar el inventario de su producto y además vender también trajes de baño para mujeres, pues  como ha aumentado la demanda es el mejor momento de surtir el negocio, todo lo que comercia es de muy buena calidad y lo vende a precios accesibles además el servicio es único, Sulma es una mujer emprendedora con muchas ganas de salir adelante siempre dispuesta a aprovechar oportunidades que se le presentan, es muy positiva y amable con todos sus clientes,  piensa que cuando se tiene el camino trazado el mundo entero se aparta para darle paso, tiene definido lo que quiere es por eso que le solicita a INTEGRAL un crédito que le permita comprar ropa por mayor. Sulma Judith tiene la seguridad que de esta forma podrá regalarle una mejor  calidad de vida a su hija que es su inspiración total
texts.en: Sulma Judith, 29 years old, lives with her daughter. She is dedicated to selling clothing from her home and on foot. She goes house-to-house offering her products. She has a variety of clothing for women, men, girls and boys with style: casual pants, skirts, dresses, among others. She wants to expand the inventory of her product and also sell swimsuits for women since the demand has increased it is the best time to stock her business. Everything that she sells is of very good quality and she sells it a accessible prices. Also her service is unique. Sulma is an entrepreneurial woman with many desires to get ahead. She is always ready to take advantage of opportunities that present themselves. She is very positive and friendly with all of her customers. She thinks that when you have the path across the world, you step aside to give way. She is set on what she wants. It is for this that she is requesting from Integral a loan that allows her to buy clothing at wholesale. Sulma Judith has the security that will allow her to give a better quality of life to her daughter who is the inspiration for everything.

loans.use: to buy clothing at wholesale.

loans.name: Gulsiya

texts.ru:
Гульсие 61 год, замужем, воспитала 2 детей. Гульсия с 1992 года занимается полеводством, начав этот бизнес со стартовой суммы 11,000 сом (KGS). В хозяйстве Гульсии на сегодняшний  день имеется  орошаемая земля мерою 2,28 га, где она выращивает картофель и эспарцет.  
В целях дальнейшего развития своего бизнеса, Гульсия обратилась в компанию «Бай –Тушум и Партнеры» за кредитом в сумме 25,000 сом (KGS)  на закуп семян элитного картофеля.  Доходы от кредита Гульсия планирует вложить в дальнейшее увеличение хозяйства.
texts.en:
Gulsiya is 61 years old, she is married and has two children. Gulsia has been doing field crop cultivations since 1992, a business she started with the capital of 11,000 som (KGS). Today her business consists of arable land measuring 2,28 hectares where she grows potatoes and sainfoin.

With the goal to further grow her business Gulsiya has come to Bai Tushum and Partners for a loan in the amount 25,000 KGS to buy seeds of premium potatoes. Gulsiya plans to invest the income from the loan into expansion of her business.

loans.use: to purchase seeds of potatoes.

loans.name: Korandebe/gtng Group

texts.fr:
Ramadhan fait partie du groupe Korandebe /Gtng. Il a 34 ans, il est marie avec 1 enfants de 12 ans et il est scolarise. Son niveau d’éducation est de 6 ans de primaire.
Ramadhan est agriculteur de riz. C’est son deuxième cycle de prêt avec ACB. Il va utiliser son crédit afin d’acheter des engrais chimique et payer la main d’œuvre.
Sa stratégie pour la croissance de son business est demander l’autre crédit pour accroitre se activités agricole. Dans les prochaines années, Ramadhan voudrait être un meilleur producteur de riz dans sa région. Avec les profits, il prévoit de payer les frais scolaire pour ses enfants.
texts.en:
Ramadhan is a member of the Korandebe /Gtng group. He is 34 and married with one child of 12 who attends school. His education is of 6 years of primary level.
Ramadhan is a rice farmer. This is his second loan with ACB. He will use his credit to purchase chemical fertilizer and to pay labourers.
His strategy for the growth of his business is to request another loan to increase his agricultural activities. Over the coming years, Ramadhan would like to become a better rice producer in his region. With the profits, he plans to pay the school fees for his children.

loans.use: to purchase chemical fertilizer and to pay labourers.

loans.name: Sandra Carolina

texts.es: Sandra Carolina de cincuenta y un años de edad, madre soltera, vive junto a sus hijos, ella tiene un taller de costura donde confecciona toda clase de prendas, vestidos, faldas, pantalones, blusas entre otras todo al gusto del cliente, últimamente se ha hecho de más clientela pues le gusta ser novedosa, estar a la vanguardia, todo su trabajo es elaborado con material de primera calidad y a precios justos además el servicio es excelente, ella es una de las pocas confeccionistas que han quedado que realmente se esmera por preparar a sus clientes sus prendas y terminen satisfechos; Sandra es una mujer humilde, sencilla con muchas ganas de salir adelante y cumplir todas sus metas una de ellas es hacer crecer su negocio y mantenerse adelante de la competencia, piensa que si vives debes construir tu propio destino, ella ya comenzó es por eso que le solicita a INTEGRAL un crédito que le permita comprar tela por mayor, hilos, agujas etc y no falte los insumos necesarios para continuar su negocio. Sandra Carolina tiene la certeza que asi podrá darle a su familia mejores opciones de vida garantizando estudio a sus hijos.
texts.en:
Sandra Carolina, 51, is a single mother who lives with her children.  She has a sewing shop where she makes all kinds of clothing: dresses, skirts, trousers, and blouses, among other items, to customer order.  Lately she has more clientele because she likes to be innovative and in the vanguard.  All of her work is done with top qality material and at the best prices possible, not to mention her excellent service.  She is one of the few seamstresses who does her best to satisfy her customers.

Sandra is a humble, simple woman who is very determined to get ahead and meet all her goals for increasing business and staying ahead of competition.  She believes that one must build one's own destiny.  She has requested a loan through INTEGRAL to buy wholesale fabric, thread and needles to have the necessary supplies to continue her work  Sandra Carolina is confident that she will be able to provide her family with a better lifestyle while making sure her children get a good education.

loans.use: To buy wholesale fabric, thread and needles.

loans.name: Enagnon Group

texts.fr: Le groupe ENAGNON est composé de trois personnes qui résident dans le même quartier. La représentante du groupe du nom de Maïmouna est celle qui a la main levée sur la photo. Maïmouna est âgée de 67 ans et vit au Bénin. Maïmouna est une veuve ayant quatre enfants, dont un seul enfant est à sa charge. Parmi les enfants, certains sont scolarisés. Maïmouna n’a pas fréquenté l’école. Maïmouna vit seule avec son enfant à charge et assure seule les besoins de la maison. Pour subvenir à ses divers besoins, Maïmouna vend des kolas et des produits divers à son domicile depuis une dizaine d’année. Maïmouna s’approvisionne dans un marché du Benin. Grâce au revenu que lui génère cette activité, Maïmouna contribue aux différents besoins de son enfant. Pour satisfaire aux besoins de sa clientèle de plus en plus grandissante, Maïmouna sollicite un deuxième crédit auprès de ALIDé ensemble avec les autres membres du groupe ENAGNON. Le premier crédit reçu antérieurement a été bien remboursé.
texts.en: ENAGNON is a group composed of three people who live is the same neighborhood. The representative of the group who goes by the name of Maïmouna is the one with her hand raised in the photo. Maïmouna is 67 years old and lives in Benin. Maïmouna is a widow with four children, one of which is dependent on her. Some of her children attend school. Maïmouna did not go to school. She lives alone and supports the household needs alone. To provide for her various needs she has sold kola and other products from home for about ten years. Maïmouna buys her stock at a market in Benin. Thanks to the income that this activity generates for her, Maïmouna contributes to the various needs of her child. In order to satisfy the growing demand of her clientele she requests a second loan from ALIDé with the other members of the ENAGNON group. The first credit received previously was repaid correctly.

loans.use: to purchase kolas and other products.

loans.name: Dagbegnon Group

texts.fr: Le groupe DAGBEGNON est formé de trois  personnes qui résident dans un même quartier. La représentante de ce groupe, nommée Afiavi Pauline, est celle dont la main est levée sur la photo. C’est la deuxième fois que ce groupe sollicite l’appui financier d’ALIDé en vue d’élever le niveau de leur activité. Afiavi Pauline est âgée de 42 ans et est mariée à un certain Lucien. Le couple a deux enfants, dont un est scolarisé, et tous à leur charge. Afiavi Pauline n'a pas fréquenté l'école. Il y a vingt ans, Afiavi Pauline vend de la nourriture (pâte de maïs fermenté) dans une ville du Bénin. Afiavi Pauline achète ses produits dans un marché du Bénin.  Dans le but d’augmenter le stock de ses produits et de mieux répondre à la demande de sa clientèle, Afiavi Pauline sollicite pour une deuxième fois, l'appui financier de ALIDé, ensemble avec les autres membres du groupe DAGBEGNON. Le premier crédit a été bien remboursé.
texts.en: DAGBEGNON is a group made up of three people who live in the same neighborhood. The representative of this group, who is named Afiavi Pauline, is the one with her hand raised in the photo. This is the second time that this group has requested financial aid from ALIDé in order to raise the level of their activity. Afiavi Pauline is 42 years old and married to a man named Lucien. The couple has two children of which one attends school and both are dependent. Afiavi Pauline did not go to school. For twenty years she has been selling food (fermented corn dough) in a town in Benin. Afiavi Pauline buys her produce at a market in Benin. In order to increase her stock and better satisfy the demand of her customers, together with the other members of the DAGBEGNON group Afiavi Pauline requests financial aid from ALIDé for the second time. The first loan was repaid correctly.

loans.use: to purchase condiments and corn.

loans.name: Clotilde

texts.fr:
Clotilde est une femme agée de 66 ans, mariée et mère de 08 enfants dont l'âge varie entre 18 et 37 ans parmi lesquels 04 vont encore à l'école.
elle mène une activité de transformation des aliments frais (poissons, épices, légumes,...) en vivres secs qu'elle commercialise au domicile conjugal. ses fonds propres lui permettent juste d'acheter un carton de poissons et un peu d'autres produits, les transforment et attend les paiements après livraison auprès de sa clientèle pour pouvoir répondre à d'autres demandes. Alors, ce crédit lui permettra non seulement de renforcer son stock de produits, mais aussi de satisfaire la demande de sa clientèle qui va grandissante et les bénéfices supplémentaires générés lui permettront d'aider son époux dont l'âge est quelque peu avancé à mieux assurer l'éducation de leurs enfants.
texts.en:
Clotilde is a 66-year-old woman who is married and the mother of eight children, whose ages range from 18 to 37 and of whom four still attend school. Clotilde runs a business converting fresh food (fish, spices, vegetables, etc.) to dried food, which she sells from her home.

Her own funds just allow her to purchase a carton of fish and a few other goods, convert them and wait for payment after their delivery to her customers in order to fulfill other requests. So this loan will allow Clotilde not only to increase her stock, but also to meet the requests of her customers, which are increasing; the additional profits generated will allow her to help her husband, who is getting on in years, to better manage the education costs of their children.

loans.use: To increase her working capital.

loans.name: Twisungane/kanoga Group

texts.fr:
Augustin fait partie du groupe Twisungane / Kng. Il a 46 ans, il est marie avec 3 enfants de 10 ans à 12 ans, dont  tous  3  scolarises. Il a 1 personne en charge autre que ses enfants. Son niveau d’éducation est de 6 ans de primaire.
Augustin est agriculteur de riz. C’est son deuxième cycle de prêt avec ACB. Il va utiliser son crédit afin d’acheter des engrais chimique et payer la main d’œuvre.
Sa stratégie pour la croissance de son business est d’utiliser des semences sélectionnées. Dans les prochaines années, Augustin voudrait être un meilleur producteur de riz dans sa région. Avec les profits, il prévoit de payer les frais scolaire pour ses enfants.
texts.en: Augustin is a member of the Twisungane / Kng. group. He is 46 years old. He is married with 3 children, 10 to 12 years old, all of whom attend school. Besides his children, he has one additional dependent.  Augustin finished 6 years of primary school.  He is a rice farmer.  This is his second loan with ACB.  He will use his loan to buy chemical fertilizer and to pay for labor.  His strategy for growing his business is to use pedigreed seeds.  In the coming years, Augustin would like to be a better rice farmer in his region. With the profits, he plans to pay the educational expenses of his children.

loans.use: to buy chemical fertilizer and pay for labor.

loans.name: Wicyererwa/sk Group

texts.fr:
Jean Claude fait partie du groupe Wicyererwa/ZZ. Il a 24 ans, il est célibataire. Son niveau d’éducation est de 6 ans de primaire.

Jean Claude est agriculteur de riz. C’est son deuxième cycle de prêt avec ACB. Il va utiliser son crédit afin d’acheter des engrais chimique et payer la main d’œuvre.

Sa stratégie pour la croissance de son business est de moderniser son agriculture en utilisant des techniques modernes. Dans les prochaines années, Jean Claude voudrait être professionnel avec l’agriculture en général. Avec les profits, il prévoit de construire une maison d’habitation.
texts.en: Jean Claude is a member of the Wicyererwa/ ZZ group. He is 24 years old and unmarried.  He has completed 6 years of primary school.  Jean Claude is a rice farmer.  This is his second loan with ACB. He is going to use his loan to buy chemical fertilizer and to pay for labor.  His business growth strategy is to modernize his agriculture by using modern techniques.  In the coming years, Jean Claude would like to be professional with agriculture in general. With the profits, he plans to build a home.

loans.use: to buy chemical fertilizer and pay for labor.

loans.name: Twitezimbere Gtz/ Rkmbr Group

texts.fr:
Jean de Dieu fait partie du groupe Twitezimbere/Gtz Rkmbr. Il a 40 ans, il est marie avec 6 enfants de 8 ans à 18 ans, dont  tous  6  scolarises. Il a 2 personnes en charge autre que ses enfants. Son niveau d’éducation est de 6 ans de primaire.
Jean de Dieu est agriculteur de maïs et tomates. C’est son premier cycle de prêt avec ACB. Il va utiliser son crédit afin d’acheter des fertilisants et payer la main d’œuvre.
Sa stratégie pour la croissance de son business est de moderniser son agriculture pour augmenter la production afin de satisfaire les marchés. Dans les prochaines années, Jean de Dieu voudrait être professionnel avec l’agriculture des maïs et des tomates. Avec les profits, il prévoit de scolarise ses enfants et payer les frais médicaux pour sa famille.
texts.en: Jean de Dieu is a member of the Twitezimbere/Gtz Rkmbr group. He is 40 years old. He is married with six children, ages 8 to 18, all of whom attend school. Besides his children, he has two dependents.  Jean de Dieu has completed six years of primary schooling.  He is a corn and tomato farmer.  This is his first loan with ACB.  He is going to use his loan to buy fertilizer and to pay for labor.  His business growth strategy is to modernize his farming to increase production in order to satisfy market demand.  In the coming years, Jean de Dieu would like to be a professional with the farming of corn and tomatoes.  With the profits, he plans to send his children to school and to pay for the medical expenses of his family.

loans.use: to buy fertilizer and pay for labor.

loans.name: Aracely Del Carmen

texts.es: Aracely del Carmen de cuarenta y uno años de edad vive junto a su compañero de vida y sus dos hijos en casa propia. Ella se dedica a la venta de ropa en el mercado municipal de la localidad donde reside, tiene varios años en el negocio y vende variedad de ropa pantalones, faldas, vestidos, camisas, entre otros, últimamente ha tenido más demanda pues todos los clientes que la visitan quedan satisfechos porque en su puesto encuentran todo lo que necesitan con producto de primera calidad y a muy buenos precios, además el servicio es excelente Aracely se caracteriza por su amabilidad; es una mujer emprendedora, humilde y sobre todo muy honrada, tiene muchos sueños que quiere alcanzar y uno de ellos es ver crecer su negocio para verse siempre arriba de su competencia, sabe que solo se logra con gran esfuerzo y dedicación es por eso que estas son sus más preciadas armas en su labor, con esa motivación se decidió solicitarle a INTEGRAL un crédito que le permita comprar ropa por mayor. Aracely del Carmen tiene fe que así podrá continuar ayudando a su esposo con los gastos del hogar y juntos continuen dando lo mejor a sus hijos
texts.en:
Aracely del Carmen, 41, lives with her common-law husband and their two children in their own home.  She sells clothing at the municipal market in the town where she lives.  For several years she has been in business selling a variety of clothing, including trousers, skirts, dresses, and shirts.  

Lately, she has more demand since all of her customers are always satisfied with the top quality and low prices she offers.  Plus, Aracely is known for her kindness.
